Data Center Optimization Initiative
  • Policy
  • Reporting
  • Contact

As a part of the Cloud Smart strategy, OMB has posted for public feedback a draft memorandum to replace M-16-19. Comments will be accepted through December 26, 2018.

The Data Center Optimization Initiative (DCOI) established in OMB Memorandum M-16-19 supercedes the Federal Data Center Consolidation Initiative (FDCCI) and fulfills the data center requirements of the Federal Information Technology Acquisition Reform Act (FITARA).

DCOI requires agencies to optimize and consolidate data centers to deliver better services to the public while increasing return-on-investment to taxpayers.

Progress to Date (since 2016)

$1,943,972,508 in savings & cost avoidance

210 tiered data centers closed

3,005 non-tiered data centers closed

source: IT Dashboard
